samples.instruction: Cheating case-kku enna punishment?
samples.current_output: IPC 420 (BNS 318): Cheating and dishonestly inducing delivery of property - 7 years imprisonment + fine. Cheque bounce: Negotiable Instruments Act 138 - 2 years imprisonment + twice cheque amount fine. Civil + criminal both options undu.

Benefits: 1) Collective voice against unfair practices, 2) Negotiate with owner associations, 3) Legal aid pooling, 4) Information sharing. Registration: Societies Registration Act-à®©à¯ à®•à¯€à®´à¯. Apartment complexes: Resident Welfare Association (RWA) common. Protect yourselves through unity.

samples.instruction: Maintenance kodukkaavittaal enna action edukkalam?
samples.current_output: Options: 1) Execution petition - salary attachment, property attachment, 2) Contempt of court - imprisonment up to 3 months, 3) Section 125 CrPC - Magistrate can order payment + imprisonment. Arrears + future maintenance ketkalam. Don't delay - act immediately.

samples.instruction: Affidavit enge panradhu? Cost enna?
samples.current_output: Notary Public office (court complex nearby). Cost: Rs.50-200 (stamp paper) + Rs.100-500 (notary fee). Documents: ID proof, matter details. Self-drafted allowed. Notarized affidavit = legal document. e-Stamp paper available at banks.

samples.instruction: Morphed photos upload pannitaanga - enna action?
samples.current_output: Serious offence: IT Act 66E (privacy violation), 67/67A (obscene/sexually explicit content), IPC 500 (defamation), 509 (insult to modesty). Steps: 1) Platform report (takedown), 2) cybercrime.gov.in, 3) Police FIR. Women: Additional protection under POCSO (if minor), DV Act.

samples.instruction: Streedhan-kkum Dowry-kkum enna vithiyaasam?
samples.current_output: Streedhan = Woman's personal property (gifts from parents, relatives - voluntarily given). Dowry = Demand-aa kettu vaangiyathu (illegal). Streedhan wife's absolute property - husband touch panna mudiyaadhu. Streedhan claim divorce-la pannalam.

samples.instruction: Neighbour en land-la aakkramippu seigiraar - enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Survey seydhu boundary verify pannunga, 2) Written notice anuppunga, 3) Tahsildar-kku complaint, 4) Civil Court-la injunction + possession suit. Documents: Patta, Survey sketch, Photos, EC. Forceful removal try pannaadheenga.

samples.instruction: Velayila irundhu nirutitaanga, F&F eppa kidaikkum? (Madurai style)
samples.current_output: Full and Final settlement: 30-45 days-la kidaikkanum. Include: Salary, leave encashment, bonus, gratuity (if eligible), notice pay, reimbursements. Delay aanaa Labour Commissioner-kku complaint. Documents: Relieving letter, experience letter, salary slip, Form 16 - ellam kelunga.

samples.instruction: Accident aayidutchu, insurance company sariyaa settle pannala (Coimbatore style)
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Written complaint insurance company-kku, 2) IRDAI grievance portal (igms.irda.gov.in), 3) Insurance Ombudsman (free, Rs.30 lakh varai), 4) Consumer forum. Documents ready-aa vachukonga - FIR, medical bills, repair estimate, photos.

samples.instruction: Physical violence illaamal DV complaint podalaamaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. DV Act covers: 1) Physical abuse, 2) Sexual abuse, 3) Emotional/verbal abuse (insults, humiliation), 4) Economic abuse (money control, property denial). Dowry harassment, threat, intimidation - ellam DV. Evidence: Recordings, messages, witnesses.

samples.instruction: Rent Authority endraal enna? Enge irukku?
samples.current_output: 2017 Act-in keezh uruvakkappatta dispute resolution body. Ovvoru district-lum District Collector thalaimayil Rent Authority irukku. Rent disputes, eviction issues, deposit refund problems ivattrai handle seivaanga. Court-ai vida faster resolution.

samples.instruction: Cheque bounce aanaal enna case varum?
samples.current_output: Negotiable Instruments Act Section 138: 1) Cheque bounce = criminal offence, 2) Payee demand notice anuppanum (15 days-kkul), 3) 15 days-kkul pay pannala = complaint file pannalam, 4) Punishment: 2 years jail + double amount fine, 5) Time limit: Cause of action-la irundhu 1 month-kkul case podanum.

samples.instruction: Varadatchanai kekkuraanga, enga poi solrathu? (Madurai style)
samples.current_output: Recording vachukonga - phone calls, conversations. Messages screenshot edunga. Women helpline 181, or All Women Police Station-la complaint. Dowry Prohibition Act-la case podalam. 5 years jail + fine - kekkuravangalukkum kodukuravangalukkum.

samples.instruction: Credit card bill pay panna mudiyala, harassment varudhu, enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: RBI Fair Practice Code: 1) Recovery agents 7AM-7PM only contact pannalam, 2) Office/relatives-kitta poga koodaadhu (without permission), 3) Threaten, abuse panna koodaadhu, 4) Violation: Bank-kku + RBI-kku complaint, 5) Settlement option kelunga - usually 50-70% pay panni close pannalam. Police complaint-um podalam harassment-kku.

samples.instruction: Neighbour satham pottu thollai tharugiraar - enna seivathu?
samples.current_output: Steps: 1) Friendly talk mudhalil, 2) Written complaint to RWA/Association, 3) Police complaint (IPC 290 - public nuisance), 4) Civil Court injunction. Night 10PM-6AM noise: Noise Pollution Rules violation. Decibel limit: Residential area 55dB day, 45dB night.

samples.instruction: UPI fraud aanaal udane enna seyyanum?
samples.current_output: Golden hour (first 24 hours mukkiyam): 1) Bank-kku immediately call - transaction block, 2) 1930 helpline (cyber fraud), 3) cybercrime.gov.in-la complaint, 4) UPI app-la report, 5) Nearby police station FIR. Amount recover chance: 24 hours-la report = higher chance.

samples.instruction: Penn kuzhanthaikalukku property right irukkaa?
samples.current_output: Aama. 2005 Hindu Succession Amendment Act padi magalkalukku magankalukku samamaana right undu - ancestral property-lum, self-acquired property-lum. Married/unmarried difference illa. Idhu retrospective-aa apply.
